name: Apex-Armored
description: A colossal figure clad in shimmering plates of armor that seem to shift and writhe with an internal energy. Its limbs are grotesquely elongated, ending in razor-sharp claws capable of tearing through steel like paper. A single red optic pulses from its helmeted head, scanning for prey.

flavor.rationale: Apex-Armored has been drawn to the anomaly's energy signature and perceives it as a threat to its existence. It seeks to neutralize it by any means necessary.
